ISSUE.TITLE: Linked example does not use Supabase
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link [supabase docs](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/connecting-to-postgres/serverless-drivers) [github](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/9be160a51faad089eb8bcd35baa14971d4be8505/apps/docs/content/guides/database/connecting-to-postgres/serverless-drivers.mdx?plain=1#L32) ## Describe the problem The [linked Drizzle example](https://github.com/vercel/examples/tree/main/storage/postgres-drizzle) uses Vercel Postgres not Supabase, the Supabase docs should only link to examples that use Supabase. ## Describe the improvement Either: - Link to a different example that actually uses supabase - Remove the link

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: typo in auth-sql-rules-examples.js (#22831) * fix: typo in auth-sql-rules-examples.js * fix: get code sample running --------- Co-authored-by: Charis <26616127+charislam@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: removed drizzle from the examples list. Fixes: #22407 (#22809) removed drizzle from the examples list Co-authored-by: Charis <26616127+charislam@users.noreply.github.com>
